metadata.title: CVE-2019-14275 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - negligible
metadata.description:
Xfig fig2dev 3.2.7a has a stack-based buffer overflow in the calc_arrowfunction in bound.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14275` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fig2dev - 1:3.2.7a-7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fig2dev package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:3.2.7a-7').
